Authors: Adinugroho T.Y., Heriyanni E., Musthofa T.A.S.
Title: Mobile web application for students’ and lecturers’ portfolio gallery
Affiliations: Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta Barat, Indonesia
Authors with affiliations: Adinugroho, T.Y., Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta Barat, Indonesia; Heriyanni, E., Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta Barat, Indonesia; Musthofa, T.A.S., Bina Nusantara University, Jakarta Barat, Indonesia
Abstract: Purpose: The purpose of this paper is to curate and promote students’ and lecturers’ works and creations, and to provide pleasing user experience for mobile device users when browsing the portfolio gallery information. Design/methodology/approach: The design of the mobile web application using Rational Unified Process (RUP) methodology includes Unified Modeling Language (UML) diagrams. The evaluation is done in three steps: first step by comparing similar software, the second step by evaluate the interface using the eight golden rules and the last one by taking user questionnaire. Findings: Evaluation of the application of Bina Nusantara University (BINUS) Store Mobile Web. Originality/value: The authors report the development of BINUS Store Mobile web application by using Hypertext Preprocessor (PHP) with Laravel framework and evaluate it in Android and iOS environments. © 2017, © Emerald Publishing Limited.
References: Bogossian, F.E., Kellett, S.E., Mason, B., The use of tablet PCs to access an electronic portfolio in the clinical setting: a pilot study using undergraduate nursing students (2008) Elsevier, pp. 246-253; Herrera, O., Ochoa, S.F., Neyem, A., Betti, M., Aldunate, R., Fuller, D.A., A mobile portfolio to support communities of practice in science education (2007) Online Communities and Social Computer, pp. 416-425. , Springer-Verlag, Berlin, Heidelberg; Huang, L., Lu, X., Ba, S., An empirical study of the cross-channe; effects between web and mobile shopping channels (2015) Information & Management; Hung, W.-H., ChanLin, L.-J., Development of mobile web for the library (2015) Procedia … Social and Behavioral Sciences, 197, pp. 259-264; Lee, G., Raghu, T.S., (2011) Product portfolio and mobile apps success: evidence from app store market, pp. 1-10. , Proceedings of the Seventeenth Americas Conference on Information Systems, Association for Information Systems, Detroit, MI; Ma, Y., Liu, X., Zhang, S., Xiang, R., Liu, Y., Xie, T., (2015) Measurement and analysis of mobile web cache performance, pp. 691-701. , Proceedings of the 24th International Conference on World Wide Web, ACM, New York, NY; Serrano, N., Hernantes, J., Galla, G., Mobile Web Apps (2013) IEEE Software, pp. 22-27; Shneiderman, B., Plaisant, C., (2010) Designing The User Interface, , 5th ed., Pearson; Wijaya, K.K., (2015) Tren Pengembangan Aplikasi Mobile 2015, , https://id.techinasia.com/riset-tren-pengembangan-aplikasi-mobile/, (accessed, 18 January 2016
